name: Deadline (Cleophus Davis III.)
overview: A graphic adventure game made with Gary Kitchen's Game Maker. How well he had learned during the brief period of subhypnotic training, Rosco and his two heroic companions had to reach and defuse the dangerous Discontinuity Generator, that the aliens of Vegar II had cleverly concealed in the center of the Exagor maze-fortress. Armed with the most modern of weapons available, our hero will have to carry out his mission guided by the wrist radar that will constantly indicate the distance to the target. As the only precaution, please remember to get out of the room in which you throw a plasma bomb in time or even for you, it WILL be the end. Published in Italy by Sipe in Hit Parade C64 n.20 (Febbraio 1988), New Special PlayGames n.2 (ottobre 1987), War Games n.17 (Gennaio 1988) and in Hit Parade C64 n.49 (Ottobre 1990).
